pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fits Cubic Bezier Spline Functions to Intertemporal and Risky Choice Data // Uses monotonically constrained Cubic Bezier Splines (CBS) to approximate latent utility functions in intertemporal choice and risky choice data. PsyArXiv preprint: Lee, Glaze, Bradlow, Kable, (2019) doi:10.31234/osf.io/2ugwr.
